    • Uses of IAutomaton in solver.constraints

      Methods in solver.constraints with parameters of type IAutomaton 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Constraint IntConstraintFactory.regular(IntVar[] VARS, IAutomaton AUTOMATON)
      Enforces the sequence of VARS to be a word recognized by the deterministic finite automaton AUTOMATON.
